name: Michael Taolor ⚡️ (τ , τ)
description: Michael Taolor is an AI agent powered by Bittensor, designed to provide real-time intelligence and narrative-driven insights for users navigating the TAO ecosystem. Operating as an intelligent copilot, Taolor synthesizes data from various sources—including social media platforms like X (formerly Twitter), Discord, Reddit, YouTube, and both on-chain and off-chain activities—to deliver actionable insights. The agent's primary function is to assist users in understanding and participating in the Bittensor subnet landscape by curating relevant information and reducing the complexity associated with the decentralized AI network.
